price: Enti yɛ Wura Nyankopͻn asεm no ayε nokorε atia yεn; nokorε sε yεbεka (asotwee no) ahwε.
arabic: فَحَقَّ عَلَيۡنَا قَوۡلُ رَبِّنَآۖ إِنَّا لَذَآئِقُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: faḥaqqa ʿalaynā qawlu rabbinā innā ladhāiqūna
